name: Summer Greens with Balsamic Berry Dressing
description: A fresh, in-season salad starts with greens from the garden and is finished with Epicure amazing Balsamic Berry Dressing. Simple yet delicious.

ingredients.name: sunflower seeds or green pumpkin seeds

preparation: Whirl all dressing ingredients in a blender until puréed. If dressing is too thick, stir in 1–2 tbsp water.
Place lettuce in a bowl with peaches and goat cheese. Drizzle half the dressing overtop, then toss to mix. Add more dressing, if needed, or cover and refrigerate remaining dressing for another day.
Sprinkle with almonds, sunflower seeds and pumpkin seeds, if desired.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.
